page.title: 06Baillie Gate Trout Farm
page.content: There are 30 acres of water in this 54 acre enterprise. Trout are bred in tanks and sold when suitably grown. There is a large pond for customers to{hook their own meal,}if desired. Rods and lines may be hired. There is also a{water garden centre which sells everything for the creation of a water garden -{fibre {glass ponds, fountains, plants}and {fish.}The plants are not grown on the premises but it is hoped to do so in future. There are also aquariums and fish and reptiles of all kinds - beautiful and unusual, plus books and equipment and all advice available.
